[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@asl-19/js-utils](./js-utils.md) &gt; [getObjectValueByDotSeparatedKey](./js-utils.getobjectvaluebydotseparatedkey.md)

## getObjectValueByDotSeparatedKey variable

Given a provided dot-separated key (e.g. `"foo.bar"`<!-- -->) and object extract the corresponding value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getObjectValueByDotSeparatedKey: <Leaf>({ dotSeparatedKey, object, }: {
    dotSeparatedKey: string;
    object: Tree<Leaf>;
}) => Tree<Leaf>
```

## Example


```ts

const object = {
  foo: {
    bar: "Hello"
  }
};

getObjectValueByDotSeparatedKey({
  dotSeparatedKey: "foo.bar",
  object,
})
// Hello

getObjectValueByDotSeparatedKey({
  dotSeparatedKey: "foo",
  object,
})
// { bar: "Hello"}

getObjectValueByDotSeparatedKey({
  dotSeparatedKey: "abc",
  object,
})
// undefined
```
